long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Innovative news app that lets you listen to your own choice of news websites and magazines !

Listen to your news selected content in three different ways:
▣ Pick news websites or magazines from our ever growing catalog. 
▣ Search your favorite search engine and have relevant search results read aloud for you.
▣ Create your own news playlist with Web2go Inbox. Build news playlist from your desktop or any other news App and listen later.


Web2go Free Top Features:
★ Simple & intuitive user interface
★ Professional & natural reading voice quality
★ English subtitles - with customized font size
★ Full Bluetooth support in the car
★ Control speed & pitch of narration

▪ News articles are read aloud in real time, as soon as they are published.
▪ Listen to news & magazines and web content with no limits.

Finally you can listen
Web2go team.
